name: First Upgrade of them all
description: x1.3 Points

name: Your words value a little bit more, absolutely
description: +4 Points per Word

name: 2nd Upgrade of this type
description: x1.5 Points

name: Your words value a bit more more, absolutely again
description: +10 points per word

name: Last Basic Upgrade! Your words value MORE, a bit more.
description: +20 points per word

name: Let's go back to the basics
description: x3 Points!

name: Let's go back to the basics v2
description: +25 Points per Word

name: The Beginning
description: The first root, as this upgrade, begins this journey. Here, your will to grow manifests as potential yet untouched.
bonus: A feeling of determination

name: Letters per Value
description: Your words are no longer just expressions — they become metrics of mastery. Each letter typed finds its weight in the great ledger of language, charting your fluency over time.
bonus: Unlock a Letters per Minute Counter

name: Passive Word Enhancer
description: Words now echo even in silence. The roots of language dig deeper, drawing meaning even from stillness. You've taken your first step into unseen productivity
bonus: Unlock Passive Points generation

name: Mental Expansion
description: The mind stretches, and so do your words. Where once meaning ended, now a single letter more can shape thought, expand expression, and push boundaries.
bonus: Word Length + 1. Current: [MAX LENGTH]

name: Echo Pattern
description: Repetition reveals rhythm. When letters echo within a word, they form patterns of power — familiar structures that amplify meaning through unity.
bonus: x3.5^[Groups of +1 Same Letter]. Last amount: [NEEDS SUM]

name: Lexical Diversity
description: Diversity shapes expression. Every unique letter adds a spark, a new angle to the word's design — and with each difference, your potential multiplies.
bonus: x1.8^[Different Letters]. Last amount: [NEEDS SUM]

name: Momentum Drive
description: The faster you move, the more you gain. Momentum becomes power, and hesitation is your enemy. Each word typed reignites the flame of intensity.
bonus: x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Patience Multiplier
description: Stillness holds strength. The longer you wait, the more the multiplier blooms — a quiet build-up of potential waiting to be released with the next word.
bonus: x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Precision Harvest
description: Precision breeds reward. Strike the rhythm of the bar at its peak, and watch passive power surge. But miss... and the silence will cost you.
bonus: Unlock a bar in the Passive Menu that boosts your Passive Points when clicked correctly. If not, then you lose points

name: Passive Rainfall
description: Patience becomes production. By allowing time to flow uninterrupted, your passive points accumulate like rain in a still pool.
bonus: Get an increasing Passive Points Multiplier

name: Flawless Focus
description: Perfection sharpens progress. With every word typed flawlessly, your focus is rewarded — building momentum through mastery.
bonus: You get a combo on words perfectly typed. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Combo Resonance
description: Momentum echoes through your systems. A strong combo sends ripples outward, empowering other multipliers in your arsenal.
bonus: Your Passive Points multiplier gets propagated to other multipliers

name: Unlock Gacha
description: Fortune spins in your favor — or against it. With a roll of fate, you unlock the unpredictable. Risk and reward merge in the great game of chance.
bonus: Unlock Gacha

name: Card Chorus
description: Each card held whispers its own power. The more you gather, the louder the chorus of influence — quantity becomes strength.
bonus: xSqrt([CardAmount]). Last amount: x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Lexical Reach
description: The shape of thought stretches. Words now extend beyond their former bounds, allowing for longer, more potent expressions.
bonus: Word Length + 1. Current: [MAX LENGTH]

name: Milestone Power
description: Your accomplishments no longer sit silent — they empower your every word. Each milestone adds weight to your progress.
bonus: x[AchievementAmount]/10. Current: x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Achievement Momentum
description: Success feeds on itself. Achievements earned in succession create a current — the faster you rise, the stronger the surge.
bonus: You get a combo on Achievements. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Merit Multiplier
description: Not all triumphs are equal. The rarer the feat, the greater the echo in your multiplier — excellence now truly counts.
bonus: Your achievements value more based on how hard they are. [Achievement]x[Quality]

name: Unlock Scrabble
description: Each letter now bears its true value. You unlock the linguistic ledger — where rarity becomes reward.
bonus: Every letter has a value based on Scrabble.

name: Scrabble Module
description: You now wield the power of linguistic weight. The Scrabble Module converts each letter's worth into point potential.
bonus: You obtain the Scrabble Module!

name: Rare Glyph Pulse
description: When you call upon the obscure, the system rewards you. Uncommon letters spark bursts of scoring brilliance.
bonus: Typing a word with an uncommon letter gives a temporary bonus. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Echo Memory
description: The past shapes the present. The Scrabble weight of your last ten words echoes into your next — a cascade of cumulative strength.
bonus: You get a percentage of your Total Points based on your last 10 words typed by their values in Scrabble. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Stretch Multiplier
description: Longer thoughts yield greater power. The stretch of a word is now mirrored in the growth of your reward.
bonus: x[Word Length]

name: Branch Access
description: You gaze across the divide and unlock what once was closed. Another path lies open — new strategies await.
bonus: You can purchase the branch that you didn't choose

name: Unlock Mastery
description: Beyond repetition lies understanding. You now tap into the deeper layers of the alphabet — each letter becomes a skill to refine.
bonus: Unlock Mastery

name: Enhance Alpha
description: You deepen your understanding of the Alpha set. The first letters of knowledge sharpen under your hand, becoming more precise, more powerful.
bonus: You get more Alpha levels based on Points. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Enhance Beta
description: The second glyphs awaken. Letters once overlooked now reveal their strength, and your fluency with Beta flourishes with every use.
bonus: You get more Beta levels based on Cards Amount. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Enhance Gamma
description: Gamma surges with untapped energy. These letters carry rhythm and resistance — mastering them unlocks new depths in your linguistic arsenal.
bonus: You get more Gamma levels based on Words Typed. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Enhance Delta
description: Delta flows like a river of nuance. These letters bend, echo, and build — strengthening this group shapes the tempo of your thoughts.
bonus: You get more Delta levels based on MultiUpgrades bought. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Enhance Epsilon
description: The final glyphs whisper from the edge of silence. Enhance Epsilon to command rare forms, quiet symbols, and the end of the alphabetic spectrum.
bonus: You get more Epsilon levels based on your Achievements. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Enhance Dseta
description: TO CHANGE
bonus: You get more Dseta levels based on Passive Points. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Enhance Eta
description: TO CHANGE
bonus: You get more Eta levels based on Prestige Points. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Enhance Zeta
description: TO CHANGE
bonus: You get more Zeta levels based on Mastery levels. x[NEEDS MULTI]

name: Lexical Stretch
description: Your words stretch once more. Another letter joins the symphony, expanding your reach and your voice.
bonus: Word Length + 1. Current: [MAX LENGTH]

name: Unlock Second Pack
description: Beyond the first deck lies deeper opportunity. Another set of powers now awaits your draw.
bonus: You can purchase the second Cards Pack

name: Merge Module
description: Fusion becomes possible. Through the Merge Module, your cards may unite — becoming greater than the sum of their parts.
bonus: You obtain the Merge Module! You still don't know what to do with these

name: Card Synergy Multiplier
description: It's not just the amount — it's the essence. The quality of your cards now amplifies their quantity's worth.
bonus: The cards quality amplifies the Card Multiplier Amount. [Card]x[Quality]

name: Unlock Market
description: You now enter the shifting realm of value and risk. The Market awakens — dynamic, unpredictable, rewarding.
bonus: Unlock Market

name: Branch Nexus
description: What once was locked is now open. You gain the ability to traverse paths you previously abandoned.
bonus: You can purchase the upgrades that you didn't choose.

name: High Stakes Draw
description: The edge sharpens. You now walk a higher-risk path — with greater odds of power, but darker shadows.
bonus: Better chance for Negative and Better cards.

name: Safe Pull
description: Caution guides your draw. Negative cards are shielded, but so are the heights of greatness.
bonus: You cannot get Negative cards, but you get worse cards

name: Volatility Surge
description: The market trembles with chaotic energy. Rewards may spike — or crash — with every fluctuation.
bonus: The Word Market increases and decreases with greater volatility

name: Market Stabilizer
description: Balance returns. The market calms, offering slower but safer growth.
bonus: The Word Market is less volatile

name: Volatile Burst
description: For a time, the market flares with instability. Tread carefully — or profit wildly.
bonus: You can get temporary boosts to the Market volatility

name: Market Freeze Up
description: For a brief window, the market holds its breath. No decline, only opportunity.
bonus: From time to time, the Market cannot decrease at all

name: Chance Surge on Word
description: With every word, fate rolls the dice. Sometimes, fortune grants you a flash of total power.
bonus: You have a chance of getting a percentage of your Total Points on Word Typed

name: Drip of Totality
description: With each word, a fraction of your total flows back — a subtle, steady stream of accumulated potential.
bonus: You get a reduced percentage of your total Points on Word Typed

name: Half-Curse Handling
description: The sting of misfortune is dulled. Though darkness still touches your cards, its grip weakens — and with it, your resilience grows.
bonus: Negative Cards effects are halved

name: Lexical Extension
description: The line between limitation and expression shifts once more. A single letter longer, and your words gain new dimensions.
bonus: Word Length + 1. Current: [MAX LENGTH]

name: Unlock Cardinal Sins
description: You now step into forbidden territory. The Cardinal Sins awaken — trials of vice and virtue, where power is paid for in pain.
bonus: Unlock Cardinal Sins

name: Tame the Pride
description: Perfection is no longer demanded, only encouraged. The edge of arrogance softens, giving you room to stumble and rise again.
bonus: You have a 50% of not exiting the challenge on Wrong Word Typed while on CSPride

name: Quiet the Desire
description: The temptations dim. What once glowed with reckless allure now flickers gently — easier to resist, and harder to fall for.
bonus: 2 Bad Wheel Slots less while on CSLust

name: Restrain the Appetite
description: Our hunger slows, and the urgency fades. Gluttony loses its grip, allowing for measured consumption and steadier control.
bonus: You have more time for purchasing upgrades while on CSGluttony. 3 sec to 5 sec.

name: Silence the Envy
description: The gnawing jealousy retreats. The shadows that once stole from you now waver — their touch less constant, their sting less sharp.
bonus: Your points get reduced less. Instead of 0 you get ^0.5

name: Calm the Wrath
description: The chaos quiets. The fury that once chased your every move now hesitates, giving you space to breathe and outmaneuver the storm.
bonus: You don't get ads anymore. You get letters added less frequently

name: Shake the Sloth
description: Stillness no longer binds you as tightly. The weight of delay lightens, granting momentum where lethargy once ruled.
bonus: You have to wait less for the next upgrade. From 10 sec to 5 sec.

name: Diminish the Greed
description: The curve of loss becomes less cruel. Though Greed still takes, it takes less — letting you grow even within its grasp.
bonus: Your score gets reduced less. From ^0.5 to ^0.75

name: Unlock Challenges
description: You step into structured trials. Challenges test your precision, speed, and adaptability — offering great reward to the prepared.
bonus: Unlock Challenges

name: Challenge Investment
description: Every trial strengthens your foundation. The more challenges you overcome, the stronger your passive power becomes.
bonus: x[ChalAmount]

name: Challenge Module
description: You gain access to specialized challenge mechanics. Fine-tune your approach, control your fate.
bonus: You obtain the Merge Module!. You start to feel uneasy from just seeing them.

name: Challenge Dividends
description: Each challenge feeds your growth. Their echoes now return as dividends — point bonuses granted through perseverance.
bonus: Percentage of TotalPoints based on Challenge Completions on Word Typed

name: Challenge Preparation
description: Calm before the storm. A moment of heightened focus grants you a powerful boost at the challenge's start.
bonus: You start every challenge with a temporary boost

name: Challenge Holy
description: As failure draws near, a divine spark shields you. A single mistake does not spell the end — not this time.
bonus: You get +1 Life on every challenge

name: Challenge Advancement
description: Mastery in speed rewards you twice. Complete a challenge with swift precision, and your victory echoes further.
bonus: You can get multiple completions based on how fast you complete a challenge

name: Time Bending
description: You stretch the seconds. Time flows slower within the challenge, giving you the clarity to succeed.
bonus: Every challenge completed adds 10 seconds to every Challenge

name: Challenge Nerf
description: The burden lightens. Your challenges become gentler, their demands eased — not erased, just softened.
bonus: Every challenge completed reduces the Challenge objective by 5%

name: Word Extension
description: Once again, the boundaries shift. A single extra letter reshapes how your words connect with the system.
bonus: Word Length + 1. Current: [MAX LENGTH]

name: Unlock Modules
description: Complex systems awaken. You unlock the capacity to specialize and upgrade deeply through modular mechanics.
bonus: Unlock Modules

name: Length via Letter Value
description: Each rare letter now carries more weight. Your word length increases with the density of its Scrabble points.
bonus: Words act as if they were longer based on Scrabble Points

name: Achievement-Weighted Letters
description: The more you achieve, the more your letters are worth. Scrabble points scale with your journey.
bonus: Scrabble Points count as if they were more based on your Achievements

name: Mastery-Fueled Achievements
description: Deep knowledge refines your milestones. The stronger your Mastery, the more meaningful your Achievements become.
bonus: Achievements worth more based on your Mastery Levels

name: Length to Mastery
description: Longer words carry deeper lessons. Your mastery grows faster the further your expression stretches.
bonus: Mastery EXP multiplier based on Word Length

name: Doubled Length Recognition
description: Your words now resonate with double strength. Each letter counts twice, reshaping your entire structure of gain.
bonus: Words act as if they were twice longer

name: Scrabble Synergy
description: The more you invest in the Scrabble Module, the more your letters align. Every upgrade compounds your letter-based output.
bonus: You get more Scrabble Points based on your total amount of Scrabble Module Upgrades

name: Foundational Recognition
description: Even your smallest victories now stand taller. The base value of all achievements rises by two.
bonus: Your achievements base value is increased by 2

name: Mastery Feedback
description: Your growth feeds itself. The more mastery you have, the faster you continue mastering — a self-sustaining cycle.
bonus: You get more Mastery EXP based on your Mastery Levels

name: You force the enhancer to be enhancerer
description: x1.25 Points

name: Here's a little bonus for you
description: +2 points per Word

name: I don't know exactly what to upgrade, I'm sorry
description: x1.5 Points

name: Whispers of Stillness
description: Silence becomes strength. With each breath, the system hums with unseen energy, setting the stage for a flow of passive power.
bonus: A feeling of silent potential

name: Silent Lexicon
description: Letters don't just count in words, but also in passive flow. Each rare letter adds power, even without active typing.
bonus: Scrabble bonuses now also apply to Passive Points.

name: Silent Scholar
description: Deep knowledge transcends the act of writing. Each Mastery level adds to your passive power.
bonus: Mastery bonuses now also apply to Passive Points.

name: Legacy of Triumph
description: Your accomplishments echo beyond their moment, amplifying even the passive. Each milestone fuels your progress.
bonus: Achievement bonuses now also apply to Passive Points.

name: Silent Trade
description: The market never sleeps. Fluctuations in the Market now resonate directly with your passive generation.
bonus: Market bonuses now also apply to Passive Points.

name: Code of Flow
description: Even the underlying code holds weight. The ASCII value of each word now influences your passive flow.
bonus: ASCII bonuses now also apply to Passive Points.

name: Passive Word Stretch
description: In the passive world, words grow longer, weaving new layers of hidden meaning. Each added letter amplifies the silent narrative.
bonus: +1 Letter to Generated Word

name: Path of Clarity
description: The line widens, giving more room to strike with precision. The Active Bar becomes more forgiving for those who watch closely.
bonus: Longer area for Active Bar

name: Path of Precision
description: Further widening brings clarity to the path. Precision becomes easier to achieve as the Active Bar grows larger.
bonus: Longer area for Active Bar

name: Path of Mastery
description: The path reaches its peak clarity. Every strike becomes more confident, each click more rewarding.
bonus: Longer area for Active Bar

name: Edge of Perfection
description: A hidden, narrow window reveals itself. Those who dare strike with perfect precision unlock a surge of passive power far beyond the norm.
bonus: A new area in the Active Bar appears

name: Gentle Decay
description: The system softens its edge. The penalty for slipping to the sides becomes lighter, offering forgiveness for near-misses.
bonus: -0.05 instead of -0.1 whenever the line touches the edges of the Active Bar

name: Whispers of Speed
description: The idle flow accelerates. Time bends to your favor as the bar fills faster, bringing each collection closer.
bonus: Idle Bar fills 20% faster

name: Pulse of Acceleration
description: The rhythm quickens further. The bar's pace intensifies, drawing you into the rush of passive accumulation.
bonus: Idle Bar fills 20% faster, again

name: Torrent of Flow
description: The bar surges with unmatched speed. Time and flow merge, propelling you toward a passive crescendo.
bonus: Idle Bar fills 20% faster, once again. This makes it twice faster than the original speed!

name: Echo of Abundance
description: Each completion brings not one, but two rewards. Your grasp on passive power expands as charges double with every harvest.
bonus: +1 Charges when collected

name: Overdrive Surge
description: In a fleeting burst, your passive power ignites. Collecting a charge unleashes a surge of x2 power, rewarding patience with an explosive climax.
bonus: Your multiplier charge gains a x2 bonus for 10 seconds before fully depleting when collected.

name: Dual Flow
description: Active clicks empower passive progress, and passive fills protect active flow. A hidden synergy emerges between the two bars.
bonus: Active clicks fill a percentage of the Idle Bar. The Idle Bar's fill percentage is the chance to avoid decay on Active edge hits.

name: Efficient Blueprint
description: The intricate design of your generators evolves, reducing the cost of higher tiers and paving the way for exponential growth.
bonus: Generator cost scaling is improved.

name: Empowered Constructs
description: Charges can now be assigned to specific generators, infusing them with raw potential and amplifying their output.
bonus: Assign charges to generators to overcharged them.

name: Linked Engines
description: Generators no longer operate in isolation. Each tier strengthens the others, creating a network of ascending power.
bonus: Generators boost each other, with higher tiers providing a better bonus.

name: Synergy Module Unlocked
description: A hidden module awakens, allowing deeper optimization of generator synergies. Strategic improvements now await discovery.
bonus: Unlock the Synergy Module!

name: Charge Ignition
description: Every charge collected ignites your generators, flooding them with energy for a short but intense boost.
bonus: Collecting a charge temporarily boosts generator output.

name: Prestige Tree Beginning
description: Here begins the cycle of ascent. This first node, like the seed of a vast tree, whispers of endless potential waiting to unfold. With each reset, its roots stretch deeper into the fabric of growth, preparing the way for your future.
bonus: A feeling of infinity

name: Silent Legacy
description: Your passive efforts become a hidden legacy, persisting across time. Even in new beginnings, their silent pulse remains, steady and unbroken.
bonus: Keep Passive on Prestige

name: Foundry Surge
description: Each thousand echoes of Prestige fuels the fires of productivity. Passive points swell like molten metal in the heart of your forge, growing with every spark of progress.
bonus: +X% Passive Point per 1000 Prestige Points

name: Precision Arc
description: Your focus sharpens like a blade. The Active Bar responds, resonating with a higher, clearer multiplier — the mark of one who strikes with intent.
bonus: Better Active Bar Multiplier

name: Rhythmic Surge
description: Each perfect strike upon the Active Bar sends ripples through the system. The rhythm of precision unlocks a chain of momentum, weaving a pattern of flawless power.
bonus: Gain a combo on consecutive successful Active Bar clicks

name: Stillness Bloom
description: In the quiet of the Idle Bar, power accumulates unseen. The multiplier blossoms gently, waiting to be claimed when the world awakens again.
bonus: Better Idle Bar Multiplier

name: Silent Engines
description: Your generators do not forget. Even through cycles of reset and rebirth, their quiet hum returns, ready to build anew from the depths.
bonus: Keep Generators on Prestige

name: Prestige-Driven Pulse
description: Prestige becomes the lifeblood of your generators, infusing them with a pulse that beats faster, stronger, pushing output to new heights.
bonus: Faster Generators based on Prestige Points

name: Crystalline Memory
description: Fragments of your past fill the Idle Bar even as you begin anew. The crystals glimmer with remembered strength, a reservoir waiting to be tapped.
bonus: You keep a percentage of Crystal Charges on Prestige

name: Flare of Continuity
description: Overdrive's flame burns longer, its brilliance unbroken. Momentum surges forward, defying time's grasp, extending the reach of power.
bonus: Overdrive Boost is extended

name: Overflowing Crystal
description: When the crystals overflow, they grant not just a single charge, but a cascade. Power multiplies, spilling beyond the vessel's edge.
bonus: You can gain more than one charge per fill

name: Engine's Awakening
description: Your generators awaken from slumber with renewed fervor. They surge forward, amplifying output in a wave of mechanical purpose.
bonus: Generator Boost

name: Silent Synergy
description: The stillness of the Idle Bar and the hum of generators find harmony. Together, they weave a tapestry of amplified, silent growth.
bonus: Idle Multiplier boost based on Generators

name: Whispers of Fortune
description: The echoes of chance never fade. Even after rebirth, the threads of luck remain woven through your system, granting continuity to your pulls.
bonus: Keep Gacha on Prestige

name: Overflowing Draw
description: The deck brims with possibility, spilling over its edges. With each draw, the tides of fortune widen, offering more than ever before.
bonus: +2 Cards per Roll

name: Silent Dealer
description: In the quiet passage of time, fortune stirs unseen. Every hour, a card is drawn from the void, a whisper of chance materialized.
bonus: Generate 1 card every hour

name: Fortune's Purge
description: The shadows of ill fortune are cast aside. With each draw, the hand you're dealt becomes purer, more favorable to your journey.
bonus: Less Negative Cards

name: Overflowing Promise
description: Your packs brim with latent energy, empowered by your Prestige. They spill forth extra cards, each a token of accumulated power.
bonus: +1 Card on Pack based on Prestige Points

name: Hand of Stars
description: The deck aligns in your favor. Each shuffle resonates with potential, drawing you closer to the rarest and most powerful cards.
bonus: More probability for better cards

name: Champion's Luck
description: Your persistent pursuit of fortune hones your draws. With each pack opened, your skill and luck combine, pulling the best from the deck.
bonus: Better Cards based on Packs opened

name: Convergence Ease
description: Cards align more easily, merging with less resistance. The energies of combination flow smoother, unlocking potential with fewer pieces.
bonus: You need less cards to merge them

name: Unbroken Deck
description: Your packs remain intact through cycles of reset, their contents preserved as relics of fortune's favor.
bonus: Keep Packs on Prestige

name: Prestige's Echo
description: Prestige strengthens the silent dealer's hand. The number of cards drawn quietly increases, mirroring your rise in power.
bonus: Generate more cards based on Prestige Points

name: Whispering Ledger
description: The ledger of language never fades. Even across resets, your mastery of Scrabble persists, echoing with the power of rare letters.
bonus: Keep Scrabble on Prestige

name: Gemstone Glyphs
description: The rarest letters shine brightest, each a gem in the tapestry of language. Their glow intensifies, granting a surge of points that matches their rarity.
bonus: Better Boost to rarer characters

name: Rare Glyph Cascade
description: When rare letters align in succession, they form a chain of brilliance. Each connection magnifies their power, building an unbroken cascade of points.
bonus: Each consecutive word with rare Scrabble letters increases point gains

name: Mosaic Verse
description: The diversity of glyphs creates a mosaic of meaning. Words woven from rare and varied letters resonate with deeper strength, yielding higher rewards.
bonus: More unique letters based on Scrabble Tier gets a higher bonus

name: Inferno of Letters
description: Every rare letter fuels a growing fire. When the reservoir of value bursts, it ignites a surge of points, illuminating your progress.
bonus: Unlock a bar that fills based on Scrabble value. When filled, trigger a boost.

name: Silent Triumph
description: The weight of your achievements feeds an unseen current. This steady pulse flows into your Passive systems, amplifying growth silently.
bonus: Passive Boost from Achievements

name: Prismatic Record
description: Not all achievements gleam the same. The rarer and more luminous the milestone, the greater its resonance in your journey, magnifying your Prestige.
bonus: Achievement Quality boosts Prestige Points

name: Legacy's Gift
description: Every achievement unlocks deeper understanding. Mastery itself accelerates under the glow of past triumphs, each lesson fueling sharper focus.
bonus: Boost to Mastery XP based on Achievements

name: Anchor of Equilibrium
description: The tides of the Market settle, guided by unseen hands. Each rise and fall aligns more closely with order, creating a path of steady progress.
bonus: Market fluctuation is more stable and consistent

name: Vault of Echoes
description: The Market's pulse echoes through time. Even as the world resets, its vault of influence remains, untouched and unyielding.
bonus: Keep Market on Prestige

name: Cascade of Ascent
description: One rise begets another. As the Market surges, it carries with it an echo of momentum, triggering a cascade of gains.
bonus: When the market rises, triggers another complementary rise immediately

name: Rebound of Fate
description: When the Market stumbles thrice, fate intervenes. The fall is softened, rebounding with renewed force and purpose.
bonus: Stabilizes and rebounds when falling 3 consecutive times

name: Whisper of Resilience
description: The Market's sharp edges are dulled by your mastery. What once was perilous becomes manageable, reducing the sting of misfortune.
bonus: Negative Market Events are reduced

name: Pulse of Commerce
description: Fortune flows quietly through the Market. Even when idle, the pulse of trade grants you bursts of unexpected wealth.
bonus: Gain some points based on the Market from time to time

name: Legacy of Trade
description: Your accumulated Prestige fuels the engines of commerce. Each point echoes through the Market, compounding your gains with every ascent.
bonus: Market gains are increased for every x Prestige Points earned

name: Mark of Trial
description: The echoes of your completed challenges persist. Even across cycles of renewal, your mark remains, unwavering and true.
bonus: Keep Challenges on Prestige

name: Steady Ascent
description: With each challenge overcome, a new step on your path unfolds. These victories feed a silent current that strengthens your Passive flow.
bonus: For every 10 challenges completed, you get a passive bonus

name: Tide of Triumph
description: Challenge completions ripple outward, weaving into the flow of Passive gains. Every step forward resonates with steady power.
bonus: Passive Boost based on Challenge

name: Trial's Grace
description: A hidden thread of resilience grants you one more chance. The path ahead may falter, but you shall endure beyond the first fall.
bonus: +1 Life for Challenges

name: Prestige Tribute
description: Your victories in Challenges echo beyond the present. Each completed trial strengthens your claim to Prestige, leaving a mark of triumph.
bonus: Prestige Point boost based on Challenge Completions

name: Tangled Threads
description: The energy of Challenges resonates through the world. Passive flows, Market tides, and the pulse of Cards all feel its subtle influence.
bonus: Small bonus to Passive, Market and Cards

name: Cycle Rewoven
description: Your path through Challenges need not be final. The threads of fate can be unspooled and rewoven, allowing for fresh starts.
bonus: You can reset your challenge completions

name: Echoes of Past Struggles
description: The past is not forgotten. Even before this path was taken, your previous Challenges leave their mark, bestowing retroactive rewards.
bonus: Retroactive bonus to all Challenges

name: Ascendant Momentum
description: Each consecutive triumph feeds the next. As the chain grows longer, your power swells, amplifying your journey.
bonus: Each consecutive challenge grants a stacking point bonus

name: Sinbound Legacy
description: The shadows of the Cardinal Sins linger, binding themselves to your journey. Even across resets, their imprint remains, daring you to push further.
bonus: Keep Cardinal Sins

name: Echo of Defiance
description: A hidden spark ignites, granting you one more life in the depths of the Cardinal Sins. Even as you fall, the flame of resistance flickers on.
bonus: +1 Life in Cardinal Sins

name: Shard Infusion
description: The Lexiconium Shards pulse with greater vigor, their essence resonating more powerfully with each challenge overcome.
bonus: Lexiconium Shards boost

name: Web of Sins
description: Your mastery of the Cardinal Sins weaves a web of power. The further you venture, the more Lexiconium Shards echo back, amplifying your claim.
bonus: Lexi shards boost based on Cardinal Sins records

name: Silent Concord
description: The Lexiconium Shards hum with silent resonance, feeding strength into your Passive flow. Their quiet influence grows with every shard gathered.
bonus: Lexiconium Shards boost Passive Points

name: Pulse of Power
description: The energy of Lexiconium Shards infuses your active efforts. Each word, each action surges with newfound potency, drawn from the Sins.
bonus: Lexiconium Shards boost Points

name: Insightful Tithe
description: The lessons of sin feed wisdom into mastery. As the shards accumulate, so too does your understanding, each fragment a spark of greater skill.
bonus: Lexiconium Shards boost Mastery XP

name: Legacy Tribute
description: The Lexiconium Shards become more than tokens; they are tributes to your endurance, channeling into Prestige and fortifying your legacy.
bonus: Lexiconium Shards boost Prestige Points

name: Enduring Blueprint
description: The blueprint of your systems remains etched in eternity. Even through resets, your modules persist, ready to awaken anew with each return.
bonus: Keep Modules on Prestige

name: Glyph Weaver
description: The system now weaves its own threads of knowledge. The Scrabble Module expands without intervention, drawing power with every moment passed.
bonus: Autobuy Scrabble Module Points

name: Tides of Cost
description: The currents of cost yield to your command. Each purchase now flows more smoothly, scaling in your favor.
bonus: Better Cost Scaling on Multiupgrades. Cost: ([AmountBought]/2)**(Math.log10([AmountBought]/2))

name: Hands of Fate
description: Automation whispers into the void. Multiupgrades now flow freely, weaving themselves into your systems without a single touch.
bonus: Autobuy Multiupgrades

name: Flare of Rebirth
description: In the instant of reset, a spark ignites. A burst of multiplier energy surges forth, propelling you into your next journey.
bonus: Temporary Multiplier when Prestige

name: Point Echo
description: Your collected essence echoes across resets. Even as you begin anew, a fragment of your past clings to you, carrying forward a fraction of your points.
bonus: 0.1% of Points on Prestige Reset

name: Letters of Momentum
description: The faster your thoughts race across the page, the greater your power surges. Momentum is rewarded, translating speed into strength.
bonus: Multiplier on Letter Per Second

name: Convergence Pulse
description: All paths converge into a singular surge. Every multiplier resonates louder, their combined force magnified with each fragment of Prestige.
bonus: All multipliers +x% per 1000 Prestige Points

name: Glyph Flood
description: The sheer weight of your words crushes resistance. The more letters you conjure, the more your power swells.
bonus: Multiplier on Letter Count

name: Blade of Precision
description: With every sharp stroke, your criticals strike deeper, slicing through resistance with amplified force.
bonus: Boost Critical Multiplier

name: Rhythm of Resolve
description: As your words flow uninterrupted, momentum builds. But break the rhythm, and the pulse dissipates into silence.
bonus: Multiplier on sustained words typed, resets after 10 seconds

name: Echoes of Length
description: Your words stretch into the void, echoing louder with each extra letter. Prestige weaves longer threads of expression.
bonus: Words count as longer based on Prestige Points

name: Prestige Bloom
description: Your Prestige Points bloom like unseen flowers, unfolding quietly into points that surge across every system.
bonus: Points boost based on Prestige Points

name: Dual Path Memory
description: The dual pulse of activity and stillness remains unbroken. Even through resets, both sides of your system hum quietly with power.
bonus: Keep Act/Idle on Prestige

name: Glyph Legacy
description: Every word typed leaves a mark, a glyph carved into your Prestige. The echoes of your efforts cascade into lasting strength.
bonus: Words Typed boosts Prestige Points

name: Epoch Surge
description: Each Era fuels your journey forward. Their weight accumulates, cascading into a surge of points that ripples through the system.
bonus: Points boost based on Eras

name: Era Crafting
description: You shape the future with the flames of Prestige. The next Era surges with crafted strength, forged from your accumulated power.
bonus: Allocate Prestige Points to boost unlocked Eras

name: Era Ascendancy
description: The strength of each Era grows sharper, its bonus resonating deeper into your systems with every moment of progress.
bonus: Era strength boost

name: Era Harmony
description: All systems align under the banner of the current Era. Their rhythms merge, amplifying one another in a unified surge of growth.
bonus: Boost to everything based on Era

name: Era Catalyst
description: The more Eras you cross, the greater the Prestige Points you claim. Progress accelerates, driven by the momentum of past triumphs.
bonus: Prestige Points boost based on Era

name: Temporal Surge
description: The path to Prestige bends and shortens. Each Era makes your climb more efficient, smoothing the journey ahead.
bonus: Better formula for earning Prestige Points based on Eras

name: Chrono Horizon
description: Beyond the known Eras lies a horizon of possibilities. The cost of reaching them lightens, drawing the future closer.
bonus: Eras are cheaper

name: Era Resonance
description: The fabric of the current Era vibrates with energy. Temporary pulses of power surge through your system, granting fleeting but potent bonuses.
bonus: Era events with temporary bonuses
